{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Ft-air-duo-g-s.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1300 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://fibertool.ru/catalog/active/wifi_marshrutizatory/besprovodnoy_marshrutizator_ft_air_duo_g |ppalt = (RU) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Fibertool_FT-AIR-DUO-G |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Fibertool |model = FT-AIR |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -DUO-G |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 27 March 2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Fibertool_FT-AIR-DUO-G |wlclass = AC1300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSIQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CB128M16IP-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = A0:22:4E |oui = A0:22:4E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;3.4.113;Wive-NG-HQ;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, WPA3, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, PMF, BTM, HW NAT, |addchip = 2.4GHz WLAN RF Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85303-21;;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF Front-End Module;Skyworks;SKY85746-11;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = Admin |defaultpass = Admin |defaultssid = Wive-NG-HQ |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Wive-NG
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2020 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615DN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 400 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7615DN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Future support available with {{TPFirmware|Wive-NG}} :[https://wi-cat.ru/wive-ng/who-is-wive-ng/ ''Wive-NG'' on '''Wi-CAT'''] (RU)
The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. :Default SSIDs Wive-NG-HQ.
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7621AT @880MHz (Dual Core) *Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: ''Nanya'' 256MB (DDR3) <!-- Spec RAM DDR2 >> DDR3 ? :''GigaDevice'' [https://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:64805:7095#7095 GD25Q128CSIG] --> *WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7615DN (2x 2T2R 2.4/5GHz) :FEM: [[Skyworks]] [https://www.skyworksinc.com/en/Products/Front-end-Modules/SKY85303-21 SKY85303-21] / [https://www.skyworksinc.com/en/Products/Front-end-Modules/SKY85746-11 SKY85746-11] :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn (2T2R 2.4GHz)/20dBm (100mW) :802.11an/ac Wave2 (2T2R 5GHz)/23dBm (200mW) :Antenna: 4x 5dBi (external) *WAN: 1x GbE, LAN: 4x GbE ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 (power off/on) :supports Entware (Flash/HDD) :3G/4G modem (RAS/NDIS)
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://wi-cat.ru/obzory/obzor-ft-air-duo-g/ ''Fibertool FT-AIR-DUO-G (Wave2 AC1300)'' on '''Wi-Cat'''] (RU) *[https://www.ixbt.com/nw/fibertool-ft-air-duo-g-review.html ''Fibertool FT-AIR-DUO-G (Wive-NG-HQ)'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU)

==See also== ===Models=== *[[Fibertool FT-AIR-DUO-F]] (AC1200) • [https://fibertool.ru/catalog/active/wifi_marshrutizatory/besprovodnoy_marshrutizator_ft_air_duo_f/ PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620DA @580MHz WiSoC :Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: 64MB (DDR2 int.) :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7613AEN (2T2R 5GHz) :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn (2T2R 2.4GHz) :802.11an/ac Wave2 (2T2R 5GHz) :Ports: 1x 100M WAN, 4x 100М LAN :Antenna: 4x 5dBi (external) :FW: Wive-NG-HQ *[[Fibertool FT-AIR-ONE-F]] (N300) • [https://fibertool.ru/catalog/active/wifi_marshrutizatory/besprovodnoy_marshrutizator_ft_air_one_f/ PPage] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7620N @580MHz WiSoC :Flash: 16MB (SPI); RAM: 64MB (DDR) :Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn (2T2R 2.4GHz) :Ports: 1x 100M WAN, 4x 100М LAN :Antenna: 2x 5dBi (external) :FW: Wive-NG-HQ
